meanings.definition: To swallow hastily or in large amounts.
meanings.sent1: She had to gulp down her medicine quickly before school.
meanings.sent2: He always gulps his food when he's in a hurry.
meanings.sent3: The dog tried to gulp down the entire bone in one go.
meanings.sent4: The river seemed to gulp down the rocks in its path.
meanings.sent5: The hungry child would gulp down anything in sight.

meanings.definition: A large amount swallowed at one time.
meanings.sent1: After the race, he took a big gulp of water to quench his thirst.
meanings.sent2: She felt a gulp of fear as she entered the dark room.
meanings.sent3: The gulp of soda was so refreshing on a hot day.
meanings.sent4: The gulp of air filled his lungs after holding his breath underwater.
meanings.sent5: The gulp of soup warmed her up on a cold winter evening.
